vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἄχαζ (WH, Ἄχας), ὁ (Heb. אָחָז),
Ahaz: Mat.1:9.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.15.38;
son of: Jotham (H3147H); married to Abi (H0021);
father of: Hezekiah (H2396) and Maaseiah (H4641J)
§ Ahaz, "he has grasped"
Ahaz, "he has grasped"
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞哈斯 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "擁有人"
猶大第十一任的王, 約坦的兒子 (太 1:9)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚哈斯 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "拥有人"
犹大第十一任的王, 约坦的儿子 (太 1:9)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-cha hoặc A-kha là con trai Giô-tham, vua Giu-đa lên ngôi lúc 12 tuổi cai trị được 16 năm tại Giê-ru-sa-lem. H271
